item.name: BANG!
item.comment: I know this game has some disadvantages. But still we love this game. The theme of Wild West, bluffing, shooting, tension... I've played Bang! hundreds times and want more!

item.name: BANG! Claus "The Saint"
item.comment: Some fun, but he is completely unbalanced.

item.name: BANG! La Pallottola!
item.comment: The best edition of Bang! I know this game has some disadvantages. But still we love this game. The theme of Wild West, bluffing, shooting, tension... I've played Bang! hundreds times and want more!

item.name: BANG! Wild West Show
item.comment: Expensive... But it's crazy like the whole Bang! Characters always in play, events sometimes.

item.name: Czarne historie
item.comment: It's not a game, rather set of stories. One-time using. Seems like bad product. But it's fantastic. Perfect theme, a lot of thinkig, and satisfaction at the end.

item.name: Czarne historie 2
item.comment: It's not a game, rather set of stories. One-time using. Seems like bad product. But it's fantastic. Perfect theme, a lot of thinkig, and satisfaction at the end. 2nd is as good as 1st.

item.name: Czarne historie 3
item.comment: It's not a game, rather set of stories. One-time using. Seems like bad product. But it's fantastic. Perfect theme, a lot of thinkig, and satisfaction at the end. Some stories are hard for narrator - he must adapt them.

item.name: Czarne historie: Głupia śmierć
item.comment: It's not a game, rather set of stories. One-time using. Seems like bad product. But it's fantastic. Perfect theme, a lot of thinkig, and satisfaction at the end. You have no idea how people can die...

item.name: Daję Głowę
item.comment: Idea of this game is perfect. But too few cards in box.

item.name: Drako
item.comment:
I think it's perfect 2-player game. -fast -easy rules -asymmetrical, but balanced -great theme -some randomness, but you can minimise pretty much It can be easy game to play even with children, but for 2 experienced players it is quite hard game with a lot of thinking. You have to manage your hand and prepare some combos. Both players have separate card decks so there is no situation that one is drawing all the best - if you have at the moment better hand than oponent it will change very quickly. And I love the idea of 2 actions per turn.
I recommend this as the best 2-player, fast game which you can use as a filler or play multiple duels in row.

item.name: Fasolki
item.comment: Excellent game. All-time interaction between players works perfect.

item.name: Gra o Tron: Gra Planszowa (druga edycja)
item.originalname: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)

item.name: Kółko i Krzyżyk
item.comment: Good game in some 1st plays. Later you realise that with good players there is always tie.

item.name: Miasta i rycerze z Catanu: Dodatek dla 5-6 graczy
Osadnicy z Catanu: Dodatek dla 5-6 graczy
Pędzące żółwie
item.comment: Simple, fast, for children. But adults still have fun.

item.name: The Resistance: Agenci Molocha
item.comment: I've never experienced more emotions in any other game...

item.name: Rybacy z Catanu
item.originalname: The Settlers of Catan: The Fishermen of Catan

item.name: Sabotażysta
item.comment: Fast and simple. Very good party game. And good to start game-addiction.

item.name: Small World
item.comment: Simple rules, but many races and abilities to remember. Quite fast, but you have to wait for your turn. It's not real strategy game. It's just good fun with pseudo-strategy.

item.name: Small World: Grand Dames
item.originalname: Small World: Grand Dames of Small World

item.name: Ticket to Ride Map Collection: Volume 1 – Team Asia & Legendary Asia
Ticket to Ride: Märklin
item.comment: Easy rules; fast to learn; fast turns; some randomness, but minimazed; some cut throating. Perfect light-strategy.

item.name: UK version 2.0 (fan expansion to Ticket to Ride)
Wsiąść do pociągu: Europa
item.comment: Easy rules; fast to learn; fast turns; some randomness, but minimazed; some cut throating. Perfect light-strategy.

item.name: Wysokie Napięcie: Nowe karty elektrowni
item.originalname: Power Grid: The New Power Plant Cards

item.name: Władca Pierścieni: Gra Karciana
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
